statements: SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE celebrity_name = 'Emma Watson';
SELECT fashion_style, outfit_color FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE event_type = 'Red Carpet';
SELECT celebrity_name, purchase_price, purchase_date FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE purchase_price > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices;
SELECT celebrity_name, fashion_style FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE outfit_color = 'red';
SELECT celebrity_name, fashion_style, event_type FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE event_type = 'red carpet' ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_color, purchase_price FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT celebrity_name, fashion_photo_url FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE fashion_style LIKE '%elegant%' AND outfit_color = 'black';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrities WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT id, favorite_color FROM Celebrities WHERE favorite_color='Blue';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, style FROM Celebrities WHERE style IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrities WHERE style = 'Casual' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, favorite_color FROM Celebrities WHERE style = 'Formal' AND favorite_color = 'Red';
SELECT c.name, f.outfit_description FROM Celebrities c INNER JOIN FashionChoices f ON c.id = f.celebrity_id;
SELECT c.name, f.designer FROM Celebrities c INNER JOIN FashionChoices f ON c.id = f.celebrity_id WHERE f.worn_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT outfit_name, color, price FROM Outfits WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM Trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT celebrity_id, name, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Singer';
SELECT outfit_name, color, price FROM Outfits WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name, o.outfit_name, o.color FROM Celebrities c INNER JOIN Outfits o ON c.celebrity_id = o.celebrity_id WHERE o.outfit_type = 'Casual';
SELECT t.trend_name, t.description, COUNT(o.outfit_id) AS outfit_count FROM Trends t LEFT JOIN Outfits o ON t.trend_id = o.outfit_id GROUP BY t.trend_name, t.description;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT celebrity_id, item_name, category, price FROM Apparel ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM Events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT celebrity_id, event_id, outfit_name, occasion FROM Outfits WHERE occasion = 'Formal' ORDER BY celebrity_id, event_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Apparel.brand, Apparel.price, Celebrities.name FROM Apparel JOIN Celebrities ON Apparel.celebrity_id = Celebrities.id WHERE Apparel.category = 'Shoes' AND Apparel.color = 'Black';
SELECT Events.event_name, Events.location, Outfits.outfit_name FROM Events JOIN Outfits ON Events.id = Outfits.event_id WHERE Outfits.occasion = 'Party' ORDER BY Events.date DESC;

SELECT Celebrities.name AS celebrity_name, Celebrities.nationality, COUNT(Outfits.id) AS outfits_count FROM Celebrities LEFT JOIN Outfits ON Celebrities.id = Outfits.celebrity_id GROUP BY Celebrities.id HAVING outfits_count > 3;

SELECT Apparel.item_name, Celebrities.name, Apparel.category, Events.event_name FROM Apparel JOIN Celebrities ON Apparel.celebrity_id = Celebrities.id JOIN Outfits ON Celebrities.id = Outfits.celebrity_id JOIN Events ON Outfits.event_id = Events.id WHERE Celebrities.gender = 'Female' AND Events.date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT occupation, name FROM celebrities WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT * FROM outfits WHERE outfit_price < 1000;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type FROM accessories WHERE celebrity_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM celebrities WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT celebrity_id, outfit_name, outfit_price FROM outfits WHERE outfit_category = 'Formal' ORDER BY outfit_price DESC;
SELECT t.trend_name, t.trend_category, c.name AS celebrity_name FROM trends t JOIN celebrities c ON t.trend_category = c.occupation;
SELECT b.brand_name, b.country_origin, o.outfit_name FROM brands b JOIN outfits o ON b.brand_id = o.celebrity_id WHERE o.outfit_price > 100 ORDER BY b.country_origin ASC, o.outfit_price DESC;
